## speedupTimeouts() function

Speed up all timeouts of calls to `setTimeout`<!-- -->/`setInterval`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function speedupTimeouts(page: Page, { factor, persistent }?: {
    factor?: number | undefined;
    persistent?: boolean | undefined;
}): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | The puppeteer page handle. |
|  { factor, persistent } | { factor?: number \| undefined; persistent?: boolean \| undefined; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Example


```javascript
const page = await newPage(config);
await page.setContent('<div>Hello world</div>');
await speedupTimeouts(page, {factor: 1000});
await page.evaluate(() => {
    window.setTimeout(() => console.log("will log almost immediately"), 2000);
});
await restoreTimeouts(page);
await page.evaluate(() => {
    window.setTimeout(() => console.log("will log after 2 seconds"), 2000);
});
await closePage(page);

```
